Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Innovative and detail-oriented Fresher Front End Developer with a passion for creating responsive and user- friendly websites. Familiar with version control system, i.e Git. Eager to contribute to team success through hard work, problem-solving and committed to adapt to the newly evolution of web technologies. Looking forward to applying my skills and creativity to real-world projects in a dynamic and growth-oriented environment.

Web Developer

As a web developer I understand and interpret the code for tasks like debugging, optimization and understanding the logic behind a website.

Executive

Being an executive officer in a Stevedoring & Logistics company I have to look after the operations, interaction with the clients and the parties, updates of the operations and many more to get the work done without any complication.
